summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1571, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest, from Market Street to West and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by regrading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks with wooden crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 16794 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
